oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Printing block with image of Lt. Benjamin Ferguson, Co. F, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Printing block image of Lt. Benjamin Ferguson, Co. F, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. He was from Stoney Creek, Carter County, Tennessee. He was captured at Morristown, Tenn. and later lost an arm while imprisoned in Richmond, Va. This block was probably created for publication of the regimental history of the 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA published in 1903.
